description: These hearty tofu steaks are made with pan-seared slabs of tofu coated in a balsamic reduction and dressed with garlicky sautéed red peppers and basil.
name: Balsamic Tofu Steaks with Sautéed Red Peppers and Basil
recipeIngredient: 1 lb. extra firm tofu (drained and pressed at least 20 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Place oil in medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add bell pepper and garlic. Sauté 2-3 minutes, until pepper is tender crisp. Stir a few times to mix everything.
Transfer to a bowl and add balsamic vinegar, basil, salt and pepper.
